alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Valley; Joshua Tree NP East (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 12:28PM PDT until March 29 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern portion of Joshua Tree National Park and Chuckwalla Valley. * WHEN...From noon to 8 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chuckwalla Valley; Joshua Tree NP East
